data.text: Akɨnafarir kam a Solomonɨn aghuzir akar otevir aghuiba an iti, a Devitɨn otarim, a Israelian atrivim.
Egh akar kaba, nɨghnɨzir aghuim e danɨngɨva, egh uaghan en sure damuam.
Egh akɨnafarir kamɨn itir akaba, dabirabir aghuimɨn tuavim, en sure damuam.
Eghtɨ gumazir fofozir muziariba itiba, akar kam men akurvaghtɨ me nɨghnɨzir aghuiba iniva,
Eghtɨ akɨnafarir kam gumazir fofoziba itiba bar men akurvaghtɨ, me fofozim inivɨra ikiam.
Egh akar kam men akurvaghtɨ, me aghuzir akaba ko akar isɨn zuibagh fofoghɨva,
Eghtɨ nɨ nɨghnɨzir aghuim inisɨ, nɨ faragh Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn apengan ikɨ an atiating.
Nan borim, nɨ uan amebam ko afeziamɨn aghuzir akaba baragh
Eghtɨ aningɨn akaba nɨ damutɨ nɨn dabirabimɨn ganganim deragham,
Nan borim, arazir kurabagh amir gumazamiziba arazir kuram damusɨ nɨ gaghontɨ,
Eghtɨ kamagh garir gumaziba kamaghɨn mɨkɨmam, “Nɨ izɨ, e mangɨ tuavir mɨriamɨn muegh ganam. Eghtɨ gumazir manaba izɨtɨ, e me mɨsueghtɨ me arɨmɨghiregham.
Me angamɨra ikɨvɨra ikɨ izɨtɨ, e zuamɨram otivighɨva me mɨsoghtɨ me arɨmɨghiregham,
Egh e gumazir kabar bizir avɨriba initɨ
Nɨ izɨ en akuragh,
Nan borim, kamagh garir gumaziba ko daruan markɨ,
Kamagh garir gumaziba zurara arazir kurabar amuasa bar ifonge.
E fo, kuaraziba nɨghnɨzir aghuiba ikia garima, gumazim da bagha ivem arɨsi, ezɨ da kamaghɨn garava ara zui.
Ezɨ kamagh garir gumaziba uari uari bagha azuaziba adui,
Ezɨ gumazir mɨsogha okeba, me arazir kamɨn gɨn zui, me arɨmɨghiram.
Nɨghnɨzir aghuim, a mati amizim tuavibar biziba amaga dagh ivezir danganibar tuivav ikia
Egha a gumaziba danganir uari akuvim ko, gumazamizir avɨriba itir danganibar tuivav ikia,
“Ia gumazamizir nɨghnɨziba puvatɨziba, ia zurara kamaghɨra ikiasa, a? Ia gumazamizir onganiba!
Ia oragh! Kɨ akar gavgavimra ia mɨgei, ia uan arazir kuraba atakigh.
Ia na bagh izasa kɨ uan agharim amadagha ian dei.
Kɨ ia akɨrasa mɨgei, ezɨ ia aghua.
Eghtɨ osɨmtɨzir ekiam ia batoghtɨ ia ikuvighamin dughiamɨn,
Dughiar kuram zuamɨram otogham, mati amɨnir gavgavir kuram bizibagh asɨghasɨsi.
“Dughiar kamɨn ia uarir akurvaghsɨ nan dɨmtɨ, kɨ oreghan kogham.
Guizbangɨra, ia fofozir aghuim batoke.
Dughiar kɨ ia akɨrasava amim, ia akɨrim ragha na gasara.
Kamaghɨn amizɨ, ia datɨrɨghɨn uan arazir kurar ia amiba bagh
Ezɨ gumazamizir nɨghnɨzir aghuiba puvatɨziba, zurara akɨribagh igha na gasi, ezɨ men arazir kam me mɨsozima, me ariaghiri.
Ezɨ gumazamizir deraghavɨra nan akam baraziba, me deraghvɨra ikiam.
